::KitKat:;

Waited for Rowdy to reply.  Then she had a thought enter her mind.
I won't find him, she thought, he is what my little snake-bot would 
have become.

She shook her head to clear her mind. "My snake bot? Quickstrike? No 
way. Rowdy? He wouldn't go back to that cave would he?"  She ran out 
and into the trees.  She tried searching for his scent. She was 
having diffaculty finding his scent.  It seamed to be everywhere.
She opened her link again."ROWDY! Come in please!"


---Original message----
From: Talon Harvilicz  <wilddance_mare@h...>
Date: Sun Jul 30, 2000 5:15pm
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars

Wildfire: 

She looked out into the distance, taking a long glance into the 
forest. So, this was going to be her new home. It looked rugged, and 
too unorganized to be Predacon worthy. What she didn't like was the 
thought of the little snake-bot being the leader of them. It just 
didn't settle down in her mind right. He had a harem, or those two 
females just favored him. She hoped they were because she wasn't 
going to be a part of it. 

She looked over and saw KitKat in the distance. She listened in. She 
was looking for Rowdy Wolf. She walked closer until she was close 
enough for her to reach her mind. 

"You won't find him," she said to her. "He is what your little snake-
bot would have become."
